data.name: Simulation X
data.description:
Pass-through MR shooting game.
Welcome to Simulation X.
Please experience the power of Shikigami with MR.

• Method of operation
For hand tracking only.
There is no move operation.
Basically, the scenario progresses by touching objects.
Once the battle simulation starts, it will be a gesture operation.
1.Attack - Either hand is a Paper
From the palm of your hand, the spell of Shikigami comes out.
Please hit enemies and items.
2.Defense - Either hand is a Rock
A shield will appear to prevent enemy attacks.
If an enemy attack approaches, use a shield to prevent it.

As the scenario progresses, you can use a Bomb Attack.

(Please refer to the website for a description of the items in the game.)

• How to proceed with the game
1.Start
Once booted, system navigation will begin.
Touch the Start-device to start.
2.GamePlay
If you select Shikigami, the battle simulation will start after a while.
3.GameOver
The game is over when you receive a lot of damage and the "sustainability" reaches "0".
